data.actual_result: Discord keeps highlighting the filter i have my cursor placed on
data.expected_result: i should be able to select other search filters using the arrow keys
data.short_description: can't use the arrow keys to select search arguments if the cursor is placed on the + symbol of another argument
data.steps_to_repro: - click on the search bar top right of the window - place your cursor on of the search filters + symbol and don't click it - try to to use arrow up and arrow down keys to highlight another search filter - observe - (for some users this is only reproducible with the suggestions of a search filter)
